name: Bread Project
description:
Bread Project

- Select Singleplayer in the Main Menu to enter a singleplayer game

- Select Multiplayer in the Main Menu to enter a multiplayer game

- Enter a server code and press Create to start a new game

- Enter an existing server code and press Join to join an existing game

- Press Esc to open the Pause Menu

------------------------- 

General Requirements:

- Move around with the WASD keys.

- Try to survive your bread from enemies. Your enemies include Moth, Cat, Cow, and Ant. 

- After 3 minutes (180 Seconds) of survival, you'll win the game!

- If your player has 0 HP, you'll lose the game.

- Try to pick up items in the game field to heal your bread by clicking the item in the inventory slot. 

- Collectible Items: Yeast, Milk, Chocolate, Sugar, and Wheat.

Multiplayer requirements:

- Positions are shared for players, enemies, collectibles, and projectiles

- Animations are shared for players and enemies

- Health is shared for players and enemies

- Inventory items are shared for players

AI Requirements:

- Enemies will chase after you, so try to avoid attacks or kill your enemies by pressing the left mouse button.

-------------------------
